version_description:
- Buy online, pick up in-store on select products and locations
- Enable location services to find products available near you
- Bug fixes

Earn and use your JDX Rewards in the app
- Get $5 back every time you reach $100
- Sign in to your account and use your available rewards on qualifying purchases

Store Mode now available at select JD locations
- Enable Bluetooth & location sharing in the app, and then automatically trigger Store Mode whenever you enter a participating JD Sports store
- Access your JDX rewards, scan shoes and request your size to try-on, and see which of your Favorites are available in your location, all from the app

- Fresh look for product reviews
- Store Mode improvements
- STATUS visual updates
- Bug fixes

- Store Mode improvements
- Security and performance enhancements
